subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Cheltenham Gold Cup winner Synchronised was entered in this year’s Grand National and will try to become the first horse in 78 years to capture British steeplechasing’s two biggest races in the same season.
snippet: Cheltenham Gold Cup winner Synchronised was entered in this year’s Grand National and will try to become the first horse in 78 years to capture British steeplechasing’s two biggest races in the same season.
